Package tage.networking.server

Class UDPServerSocket

java.lang.Object
java.net.DatagramSocket
tage.networking.server.UDPServerSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, IServerSocket
public class UDPServerSocket extends DatagramSocket implements IServerSocket
A UDP implementation of a IServerSocket. This socket is able to send and receive Serializable objects from server side of a game. An underlying DatagramSocket is used in this implementation.
Author:
Kyle Matz Modified from the SAGE Networking package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Ported to TAGE by Scott Gordon.

  • Constructor Details

    • UDPServerSocket

      public UDPServerSocket(int localPort, GameConnectionServer server) throws SocketException
      Creates a UDPServerSocket bound to the local port. The server passed in is used to process the packets received by this socket. See DatagramSocket(int) for information about local binding of socket.
      Parameters:
      localPort - local port to bind socket to
      server - server to process packets
      Throws:
      SocketException
